Develop a line of air fresheners that can be placed in different areas to create a pleasant scent throughout a home.
Create a room with a pleasant scent using essential oils or natural fragrances, such as lavender or eucalyptus, which can have both visual and olfactory appeal.
Develop a line of plug-ins or stick deodorizers that can emit pleasant fragrances that can last for days.
Use essential oils or natural fragrances to create a homemade air freshener by placing them in water and adding a little bit of vodka to preserve the mixture.
Create scented stickers or decals that can be placed around the house, such as on windows or walls, to add a pleasant scent to the room.
